}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The included driver has USB IDs for 0846:9012 (presumably the used ID) and 148f:3573. :"2976391503" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
{{WiFiCert|WFA14085|01/19/2012}}
